function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Indicators related to residents' health and safety may be beyond the scope of conventional sustainability pillars, creating a potential oversight in pandemic preparedness.","Impact":"Increased risk of pandemic spread due to inadequate focus on health and safety indicators.","Mitigation":"Expand the scope of sustainability pillars to include a specific focus on pandemic preparedness and health-related indicators.","Technologies":"Smart air quality control technologies, innovative sanitation systems, and health monitoring devices.","People":"Residents, building occupants, community members.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, public health authorities."}]}
